speaker: Agent
text: Good afternoon, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: Hi Mark, I'm okay. What's this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I understand. I'm calling in regards to an outstanding balance on your account. Before we proceed, could you please confirm your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for verifying that. Can you also confirm your address please?

speaker: Agent
text: Great, I have your information here. You currently have a balance of $250. How would you like to handle this today?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay half of that now and the rest next week.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds reasonable. Would you like to pay the first half by credit card or bank transfer?

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect! Please provide your card details when you're ready.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you. I'll process that payment now. Is there anything else I can help you with?

speaker: Customer
text: No, that's all. Thank you for your help!

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Have a great day.
